alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Atchison; Gentry; Holt; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:16AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Worth, Gentry, eastern Atchison, Holt, Nodaway and northern Andrew Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1016 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blanchard to Fairfax to near Shubert. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Albany, Tarkio, Stanberry, Mound City, Grant City, Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Hopkins, Ravenwood, Maitland, Skidmore, Craig, Fillmore, Braddyville, Blanchard, Irena, Barnard, Conception Junction and Sheridan. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 73 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Atchison; Gentry; Holt; Nodaway; Worth
